text: The Punisher is a 2004 crime action drama movie based on the Marvel character of the same name. ==Cast== * Thomas Jane as Frank Castle/Punisher * John Travolta as Howard Saint * Will Patton as Clinton Glass * Rebecca Romijn as Joan ==Production== Development started in 1997. ==Other websites== * The Punisher at Marvel.com * * Category:2004 crime drama movies Category:2000s American action movies Category:American crime drama movies Category:Lionsgate movies Category:Marvel Comics movies Category:Movies about revenge Category:Movies produced by Avi Arad Category:Movies set in Florida Category:Reboot movies
title: The Punisher (2004 movie)
